product.shortDescription:
Travel to another galaxy with 
this American Tourister x Star Wars hardside carry-on! This bag will show off your personality while giving you all the bells and whistles you need while traveling!

tooltip: Does the case expand for added packing capacity?

product.pageTitle: Star Wars Light vs. Dark Carry-On Spinner | Hardside Luggage | American Tourister
product.headlineDescription:
Feature Highlights:
✓ ABS printed shell
✓ Expands 1.5"
✓ Interior organization

Details:
  • Overall Dimensions: 22.5" x 14.0" x 9.5"
  • Weight: 6.61 lbs
